# ğŸ¨ **Acutrack Design System - Documentation Site Implementation Guide**

## ğŸ“‹ **Project Overview**

You are tasked with creating a professional documentation site for the **Acutrack Design System** - a comprehensive React component library with 80+ components, TypeScript support, and dark/light mode themes. This guide provides everything needed to build a modern documentation site similar to Chakra UI, Material-UI, and Ant Design.

## ğŸ—ï¸ **System Architecture**

### **Current Design System Stats**
- **Version**: 1.0.66
- **Components**: 80+ React components
- **Framework**: React 18+ with TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with custom design tokens
- **Icons**: 1000+ Material Symbols icons
- **Themes**: Light & Dark mode support
- **Bundle Size**: ~945KB (ES) / ~992KB (UMD)

### **Package Information**
```json
{
  "name": "@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds",
  "version": "1.0.66",
  "main": "./dist/acutrack-ds.umd.js",
  "module": "./dist/acutrack-ds.es.js",
  "types": "./dist/acutrack-ds.d.ts",
  "exports": {
    ".": {
      "types": "./dist/acutrack-ds.d.ts",
      "import": "./dist/acutrack-ds.es.js",
      "require": "./dist/acutrack-ds.umd.js"
    },
    "./style.css": "./dist/style.css"
  }
}
```

## ğŸ“¦ **Complete Component Inventory**

### **Core Components (20)**
```typescript
// Interactive Elements
export { Button } from './components/Button';           // 16 variants, icons, loading
export { ButtonGroup } from './components/ButtonGroup'; // Grouped buttons
export { SplitButton } from './components/SplitButton'; // Dropdown button
export { ToggleSwitch } from './components/ToggleSwitch'; // Toggle input
export { Slider } from './components/Slider';           // Range input
export { Checkbox } from './components/Checkbox';       // Boolean input
export { Radio } from './components/Radio';             // Single selection
export { Progress } from './components/Progress';       // Loading indicators
export { Spinner } from './components/Spinner';         // Loading states
export { Skeleton } from './components/Skeleton';       // Content placeholders

// Content Display
export { Card } from './components/Card';               // Content containers
export { Badge } from './components/Badge';             // Status indicators
export { Avatar } from './components/Avatar';           // User representation
export { Alert } from './components/Alert';             // User notifications
export { Banner } from './components/Banner';           // Page banners
export { EmptyState } from './components/EmptyState';   // No data states
export { Accordion } from './components/Accordion';     // Collapsible content
export { Stepper } from './components/Stepper';         // Step navigation
export { Breadcrumb } from './components/Breadcrumb';   // Navigation trail
export { Pagination } from './components/Pagination';   // Page navigation
```

## ğŸ¨ **Design System Specifications**

### **Color System**
```typescript
// Brand Colors
const brandColors = {
  navy: '#1B3A7B',        // Primary brand color
  orange: '#0d9488',      // Secondary brand color
  orangeHover: '#0a6960', // Hover state
  navyHover: '#0f2246',   // Hover state
};

// Light Mode Colors
const lightMode = {
  text: {
    primary: '#1B3A7B',    // Main headings
    secondary: '#3C4858',  // Body text
    tertiary: '#6B7280',   // Muted text
    onAccent: '#FFFFFF',   // Text on colored backgrounds
  },
  background: {
    primary: '#f6f7fa',    // Main app background
    secondary: '#FFFFFF',  // Card backgrounds
    tertiary: '#ebeff9',   // Subtle backgrounds
  },
  border: {
    color: '#DFE4E9',      // Card borders
    strong: '#5fead4',     // Focus states
  },
};

// Dark Mode Colors
const darkMode = {
  text: {
    primary: '#F6F8FD',    // Main headings
    secondary: '#9CA3AF',  // Body text
    tertiary: '#6B7280',   // Muted text
    onAccent: '#FFFFFF',   // Text on colored backgrounds
  },
  background: {
    primary: '#1c212c',    // Main app background
    secondary: '#101620',  // Card backgrounds
    tertiary: '#1e2a3a',   // Subtle backgrounds
  },
  border: {
    color: '#1c3332',      // Card borders
    strong: '#ffffff',     // Focus states
  },
};

// Semantic Colors
const semanticColors = {
  success: '#23C27D',
  warning: '#f3c94f',
  error: '#ba4335',
  info: '#3266d4',
};
```

### **Typography System**
```typescript
const typography = {
  fonts: {
    body: 'Inter, sans-serif',      // Body text
    heading: 'Raleway, sans-serif', // Headings
    icon: 'Material Symbols Outlined', // Icons
  },
  scale: {
    xs: '12px',   // 0.75rem
    sm: '14px',   // 0.875rem
    base: '16px', // 1rem
    lg: '18px',   // 1.125rem
    xl: '20px',   // 1.25rem
    '2xl': '24px', // 1.5rem
    '3xl': '30px', // 1.875rem
    '4xl': '36px', // 2.25rem
    '5xl': '48px', // 3rem
    '6xl': '60px', // 3.75rem
    '7xl': '72px', // 4.5rem
  },
  weights: {
    light: 300,
    normal: 400,
    medium: 500,
    semibold: 600,
    bold: 700,
    extrabold: 800,
  },
};
```

### **Spacing System**
```typescript
const spacing = {
  base: '4px', // 0.25rem
  scale: [
    '0px',   // 0
    '4px',   // 1
    '8px',   // 2
    '12px',  // 3
    '16px',  // 4
    '20px',  // 5
    '24px',  // 6
    '32px',  // 8
    '40px',  // 10
    '48px',  // 12
    '64px',  // 16
    '80px',  // 20
    '96px',  // 24
  ],
};
```

### **Breakpoints**
```typescript
const breakpoints = {
  sm: '640px',   // Small devices
  md: '768px',   // Medium devices
  lg: '1024px',  // Large devices
  xl: '1280px',  // Extra large devices
  '2xl': '1536px', // 2X large devices
};
```

## ğŸš€ **Documentation Site Implementation**

### **Recommended Tech Stack**
```bash
# Option 1: Next.js 14+ (Recommended)
npx create-next-app@latest acutrack-docs --typescript --tailwind --eslint --app

# Install dependencies
npm install @acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds
npm install @next/mdx @mdx-js/loader @mdx-js/react
npm install react-syntax-highlighter @types/react-syntax-highlighter
npm install prismjs @types/prismjs
npm install @headlessui/react @heroicons/react
npm install framer-motion
npm install algoliasearch
```

### **Essential Components to Build**

#### **1. ComponentPreview.tsx**
```typescript
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Button, Card, Input } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

interface ComponentPreviewProps {
  component: React.ComponentType<any>;
  props?: Record<string, any>;
  code?: string;
  showCode?: boolean;
}

export const ComponentPreview: React.FC<ComponentPreviewProps> = ({
  component: Component,
  props = {},
  code,
  showCode = true
}) => {
  const [liveProps, setLiveProps] = useState(props);
  const [showCodeBlock, setShowCodeBlock] = useState(false);

  return (
    <div className="space-y-6">
      {/* Live Preview */}
      <div className="p-6 border border-border-color dark:border-dark-border-color rounded-lg bg-bg-secondary dark:bg-dark-bg-secondary">
        <Component {...liveProps} />
      </div>

      {/* Code Toggle */}
      {showCode && code && (
        <div className="space-y-4">
          <Button
            variant="outline"
            size="sm"
            onClick={() => setShowCodeBlock(!showCodeBlock)}
          >
            {showCodeBlock ? 'Hide Code' : 'Show Code'}
          </Button>
          
          {showCodeBlock && (
            <CodeBlock code={code} language="tsx" />
          )}
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  );
};
```

#### **2. CodeBlock.tsx**
```typescript
import { Prism as SyntaxHighlighter } from 'react-syntax-highlighter';
import { tomorrow } from 'react-syntax-highlighter/dist/esm/styles/prism';
import { Button } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';
import { useCopyToClipboard } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

interface CodeBlockProps {
  code: string;
  language?: string;
  showCopyButton?: boolean;
}

export const CodeBlock: React.FC<CodeBlockProps> = ({
  code,
  language = 'tsx',
  showCopyButton = true
}) => {
  const { copy, copied } = useCopyToClipboard();

  return (
    <div className="relative">
      {showCopyButton && (
        <Button
          variant="ghost"
          size="sm"
          onClick={() => copy(code)}
          className="absolute top-2 right-2 z-10"
        >
          {copied ? 'Copied!' : 'Copy'}
        </Button>
      )}
      <SyntaxHighlighter
        language={language}
        style={tomorrow}
        className="rounded-lg !mt-0"
        showLineNumbers
      >
        {code}
      </SyntaxHighlighter>
    </div>
  );
};
```

#### **3. PropsTable.tsx**
```typescript
import React from 'react';
import { Table } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

interface Prop {
  name: string;
  type: string;
  default?: string;
  description: string;
  required?: boolean;
}

interface PropsTableProps {
  props: Prop[];
}

export const PropsTable: React.FC<PropsTableProps> = ({ props }) => {
  return (
    <div className="overflow-x-auto">
      <Table>
        <thead>
          <tr>
            <th>Prop</th>
            <th>Type</th>
            <th>Default</th>
            <th>Description</th>
          </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
          {props.map((prop) => (
            <tr key={prop.name}>
              <td>
                <code className="text-brand-orange">
                  {prop.name}
                  {prop.required && <span className="text-red-500 ml-1">*</span>}
                </code>
              </td>
              <td>
                <code className="text-text-secondary dark:text-dark-text-secondary">
                  {prop.type}
                </code>
              </td>
              <td>
                {prop.default ? (
                  <code className="text-text-secondary dark:text-dark-text-secondary">
                    {prop.default}
                  </code>
                ) : (
                  '-'
                )}
              </td>
              <td className="text-text-secondary dark:text-dark-text-secondary">
                {prop.description}
              </td>
            </tr>
          ))}
        </tbody>
      </Table>
    </div>
  );
};
```

#### **4. ColorPalette.tsx**
```typescript
import React from 'react';
import { Card } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

export const ColorPalette: React.FC = () => {
  const colorGroups = {
    brand: {
      navy: '#1B3A7B',
      orange: '#0d9488',
      orangeHover: '#0a6960',
      navyHover: '#0f2246',
    },
    semantic: {
      success: '#23C27D',
      warning: '#f3c94f',
      error: '#ba4335',
      info: '#3266d4',
    },
    neutral: {
      50: '#F9FAFB',
      100: '#F3F4F6',
      200: '#E5E7EB',
      300: '#D1D5DB',
      400: '#9CA3AF',
      500: '#6B7280',
      600: '#4B5563',
      700: '#374151',
      800: '#1F2937',
      900: '#111827',
    },
  };

  return (
    <div className="space-y-8">
      {Object.entries(colorGroups).map(([category, colors]) => (
        <Card key={category} className="p-6">
          <h3 className="text-lg font-semibold mb-4 capitalize">
            {category} Colors
          </h3>
          <div className="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 lg:grid-cols-6 gap-4">
            {Object.entries(colors).map(([name, value]) => (
              <div key={name} className="space-y-2">
                <div
                  className="w-full h-16 rounded-lg border border-border-color dark:border-dark-border-color"
                  style={{ backgroundColor: value }}
                />
                <div className="text-sm">
                  <div className="font-medium text-text-primary dark:text-dark-text-primary">
                    {name}
                  </div>
                  <div className="text-text-secondary dark:text-dark-text-secondary font-mono text-xs">
                    {value}
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </Card>
      ))}
    </div>
  );
};
```

### **MDX Page Examples**

#### **Button Documentation (button.mdx)**
```mdx
---
title: Button
description: Interactive button component with multiple variants
category: Components
---

import { Button } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';
import { ComponentPreview } from '../../components/docs/ComponentPreview';
import { PropsTable } from '../../components/docs/PropsTable';

# Button

The Button component is used to trigger actions and navigate through the interface.

## Basic Usage

<ComponentPreview
  component={Button}
  props={{ children: 'Click me' }}
  code={`<Button onClick={() => console.log('Clicked!')}>
  Click me
</Button>`}
/>

## Variants

<ComponentPreview
  component={Button}
  props={{ 
    children: 'Primary Button',
    variant: 'primary'
  }}
  code={`<Button variant="primary">
  Primary Button
</Button>`}
/>

## Sizes

<ComponentPreview
  component={Button}
  props={{ 
    children: 'Large Button',
    size: 'lg'
  }}
  code={`<Button size="lg">
  Large Button
</Button>`}
/>

## With Icons

<ComponentPreview
  component={Button}
  props={{ 
    children: 'Download',
    leftIcon: 'download'
  }}
  code={`<Button leftIcon="download">
  Download
</Button>`}
/>

## Props

<PropsTable props={[
  {
    name: 'variant',
    type: 'primary | secondary | text | ghost | outline | dashed | warning | danger | info | success | grey-primary | grey-secondary | grey-text | grey-ghost | grey-outline | grey-dashed',
    default: 'primary',
    description: 'The visual style variant of the button'
  },
  {
    name: 'size',
    type: 'xs | sm | md | lg | xl',
    default: 'md',
    description: 'The size of the button'
  },
  {
    name: 'isDisabled',
    type: 'boolean',
    default: 'false',
    description: 'Whether the button is disabled'
  },
  {
    name: 'isLoading',
    type: 'boolean',
    default: 'false',
    description: 'Whether the button is in a loading state'
  },
  {
    name: 'leftIcon',
    type: 'React.ReactNode',
    description: 'Icon to display on the left side'
  },
  {
    name: 'rightIcon',
    type: 'React.ReactNode',
    description: 'Icon to display on the right side'
  }
]} />

## Best Practices

- Use primary variant for main call-to-action buttons
- Use secondary variant for secondary actions
- Use text or ghost variants for subtle actions
- Use danger variant sparingly for destructive actions
- Provide clear, actionable text in button labels
- Use icons to enhance button meaning when appropriate
```

### **Configuration Files**

#### **next.config.js**
```javascript
const withMDX = require('@next/mdx')({
  extension: /\.mdx?$/,
  options: {
    remarkPlugins: [],
    rehypePlugins: [],
  },
});

/** @type {import('next').NextConfig} */
const nextConfig = {
  pageExtensions: ['ts', 'tsx', 'js', 'jsx', 'md', 'mdx'],
  experimental: {
    appDir: true,
  },
  images: {
    domains: ['localhost'],
  },
};

module.exports = withMDX(nextConfig);
```

#### **tailwind.config.js**
```javascript
/** @type {import('tailwindcss').Config} */
module.exports = {
  content: [
    './src/pages/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx,mdx}',
    './src/components/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx,mdx}',
    './src/app/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx,mdx}',
  ],
  darkMode: 'class',
  theme: {
    extend: {
      colors: {
        // Import colors from design system
        'brand-navy': '#1B3A7B',
        'brand-orange': '#0d9488',
        'text-primary': '#1B3A7B',
        'text-secondary': '#3C4858',
        'bg-primary': '#f6f7fa',
        'bg-secondary': '#FFFFFF',
        'bg-tertiary': '#ebeff9',
        'border-color': '#DFE4E9',
        'dark-text-primary': '#F6F8FD',
        'dark-text-secondary': '#9CA3AF',
        'dark-bg-primary': '#1c212c',
        'dark-bg-secondary': '#101620',
        'dark-bg-tertiary': '#1e2a3a',
        'dark-border-color': '#1c3332',
      },
      fontFamily: {
        body: ['Inter', 'sans-serif'],
        heading: ['Raleway', 'sans-serif'],
      },
    },
  },
  plugins: [],
};
```

### **Essential Pages to Create**

1. **Homepage** (`src/app/page.tsx`)
   - Hero section with design system overview
   - Featured components showcase
   - Quick start guide
   - Statistics and metrics

2. **Getting Started** (`src/app/guides/getting-started.mdx`)
   - Installation instructions
   - Basic setup
   - First component usage
   - Theme setup

3. **Foundations** (`src/app/foundations/`)
   - Colors (`colors.mdx`)
   - Typography (`typography.mdx`)
   - Spacing (`spacing.mdx`)
   - Icons (`icons.mdx`)

4. **Components** (`src/app/components/`)
   - Individual component pages
   - Interactive examples
   - Props documentation
   - Best practices

5. **Guides** (`src/app/guides/`)
   - Migration guides
   - Best practices
   - Accessibility guidelines
   - Performance tips

### **Deployment Configuration**

#### **Vercel (Recommended)**
```json
{
  "version": 2,
  "builds": [
    {
      "src": "package.json",
      "use": "@vercel/next"
    }
  ]
}
```

#### **Netlify**
```toml
[build]
  command = "npm run build"
  publish = ".next"

[[redirects]]
  from = "/*"
  to = "/index.html"
  status = 200
```

## ğŸ¯ **Success Criteria**

### **Performance Targets**
- **Page Load Speed**: < 3 seconds
- **Lighthouse Score**: 95+
- **Mobile Performance**: 90+
- **Accessibility Score**: 95+

### **User Experience Goals**
- **Search Functionality**: < 500ms response time
- **Mobile Responsiveness**: 100% mobile-friendly
- **Dark Mode**: Seamless theme switching
- **Code Examples**: Copy-paste ready

### **Content Requirements**
- **Component Coverage**: 100% of components documented
- **Interactive Examples**: Every component has live preview
- **Props Documentation**: Complete API reference
- **Best Practices**: Do's and don'ts for each component

## ğŸš€ **Implementation Checklist**

### **Phase 1: Setup & Foundation**
- [ ] Create Next.js project with TypeScript
- [ ] Install and configure dependencies
- [ ] Set up Tailwind CSS with design system colors
- [ ] Create basic layout components (Header, Sidebar, Footer)
- [ ] Implement theme toggle functionality

### **Phase 2: Core Documentation Components**
- [ ] Build ComponentPreview component
- [ ] Build CodeBlock component with syntax highlighting
- [ ] Build PropsTable component
- [ ] Build ColorPalette component
- [ ] Build IconGrid component
- [ ] Implement search functionality

### **Phase 3: Content Creation**
- [ ] Create homepage with hero section
- [ ] Write getting started guide
- [ ] Document all 80+ components
- [ ] Create foundations pages (colors, typography, spacing)
- [ ] Add interactive examples for each component

### **Phase 4: Enhancement & Polish**
- [ ] Implement responsive design
- [ ] Add animations and transitions
- [ ] Optimize performance
- [ ] Add accessibility features
- [ ] Implement SEO optimization

### **Phase 5: Deployment**
- [ ] Set up CI/CD pipeline
- [ ] Deploy to Vercel/Netlify
- [ ] Configure custom domain
- [ ] Set up analytics
- [ ] Test across browsers and devices

This comprehensive guide provides everything needed to build a professional documentation site for the Acutrack Design System. Follow the structure, implement the components, and create engaging content to showcase your design system effectively! ğŸš€
